message: i got this problem randomly too

Database.connect(**conn_params)
[...]
OperationalError: asynchronous connection failed

looks like the database was restarted
This is what I got and am still getting when trying to access convore on chromium. but it works ok for me in firefox now

Traceback (most recent call last):

OperationalError: asynchronous connection failed
Sorry about this guys, we scrambled to fix it and we're going to root cause the issue and figure out how we can stop it from happening again
Given this is the #2 Google result for this topic, can you share what you did to fix it?
Yep - I'd be interested in knowing what the root cause was here too (assuming it's not very Convore-specific, of course)
Would be interesting in hearing this as well.
